name: Bubble Shooter Fruits BlastPop
description:
Play the classic and most addictive bubble pop game for FREE, match 3 fruits(colors) and clear levels.

Ready to Start the Action?:
- Aim, match and smash all the balls in this relaxing fruits-matching adventure.
- This is one of the best shooter games that are simple and easy to learn, perfect for families to enjoy!
- Fun and addictive bubble shooting game! Clear all bubbles on the screen to make them level and try to get 3 stars on each level.

How to play:
- Play the Classic Game Mode - So Simple.
- Tap the screen to shooting the bubble.
- Match 3 or more identical bubbles.
- Aim to make the perfect shot.
- Click on the props in the game and use props can make it easy for you to pass the game
- Try to finish the level before your bubble balls run out.
- Consecutively breaking balls can add points.

Feature:
-Smooth bubble shooting game experience with beautiful designs and animations.
-There are +1,000 different and challenging levels.
-Get special bubbles, fruits bubbles, extra bubbles and many more features at the power of your fingertips.
-Enjoy beautiful bubble designs and awesome background graphics.
-Completely free bubble shooter game that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere.
-Addictive game: Use bubbles to pass boring time.
- It's easy for everyone: commuters, housewives, cute young ladies, elderly, children, etc.
- This game is exercise the brain, super addictive, and a great way to spend free time on the airport, bus, train or car.
- Anytime, anywhere, shooting must go on.You can still play without internet access.
- This is a very worth playing casual adventure game, no network can also play.

Note;
- This game contains the banner, interstitial, and reward video ads. You can choose to remove it by purchasing ‘remove ads’ from the shop.
- You can enjoy the game for free, but you can also choose to purchase in-game currencies or ad removal within the app.

Let’s have fun here! Go and kill the boring time , have fun with your friends! Train your brain and your fingers !!! Get ready, aim !! go shooting bubbles!
Bubble Shooter is the game brings exciting entertainment experiences, helping you relax after stressful working and studying hours.

We also welcome the reviews and feedback from players all around the world to help us to improve the game quality.
